title: Comics Dating Comics with Taylor Tomlinson
itunes:title: Comics Dating Comics with Taylor Tomlinson
description:
Taylor Tomlinson joins Chelsea to talk about what it’s like to date another comedian, how it felt to grow up in a deeply religious family, the backhanded compliments some people give women in comedy. Then: A lawyer is hurt when her best friend drags her boyfriend for his lack of career ambition.  Student loans get the best of a 29-year-old in the midst of a quarter-life crisis.  And a mom wonders how to smooth things over after her daughter overhears her entertaining a gentleman caller. 

*

Executive Producer Nick Stumpf

Produced by Catherine Law

Edited & Engineered by Brandon Dickert

*

*

*

*

*

Guests and listeners should not rely on matters discussed in the Podcast and shall not act or shall refrain from acting based on information contained in the Podcast without first seeking independent medical advice.

 

 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
